## ğŸ¯ First Steps

### 1. Start with README.md (5 minutes)
```bash
# View the main README
cat README.md
# Or open in your editor
```

### 2. Run the Live Demo (2 minutes)
```bash
# Install dependency
pip install ttkbootstrap

# Run interactive demo
python scripts/theme_preview.py
```

This launches an interactive window where you can:
- Switch between all themes live
- See sample UI components
- Compare visual styles
- Choose your preferred theme

### 3. Review Implementation Guide
```bash
# Read step-by-step instructions
cat IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md
```

## ğŸ¨ Theme Recommendations

Based on your HUD-style gaming UI:

**#1 Recommended: CYBORG**
- Futuristic neon cyan aesthetic
- Perfect for gaming/real-time dashboards
- High contrast (16:1+)

**#2 Alternative: DARKLY**
- Professional VS Code style
- Conservative and accessible
- Business-appropriate

**#3 Bold Option: SUPERHERO**
- Comic-inspired vibrant colors
- Energetic and distinctive
- Consumer-friendly
